title: Lemon poppy seed muffins
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '150g caster sugar', '4 tablespoons poppy seeds', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '250g lemon yoghurt', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon grated lemon zest', '80ml lemon juice', '3 tablespoons caster sugar']
